<template>
  <HeaderPage></HeaderPage>
  <SideBar></SideBar>
</template>

<script>
import HeaderPage from './components/HeaderPage.vue' ;
import SideBar    from './components/SideBar.vue'    ;

export default {
  name: 'App',

  components: { 
    HeaderPage,
    SideBar,
  },
  methods: {
    async saveData(){
      
      await fetch( '', {
        method: 'post',
        headers: {
              'Content-type': "application/json; charset=UTF-8"
            },
            body: JSON.stringify({
              program:  this.shapes
            }),
      });
    

    },
    async loadData(){
      
      const result = await fetch('');

      const paint = result.json();

      this.shapes = paint['program']

    }
  }
}

</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
